name: Sunburst Ski Area
description: Making winter fun a longstanding tradition. At Sunburst, we’ve been providing local folks with family fun since 1961. Whether you’re an avid skier, snowboarder, tuber, or just learning the slopes, the freshest snow and best terrain around is waiting for you thirty minutes outside of Milwaukee. In Kewaskum, you’ll find the World’s Largest Tubing Hill and a variety of hills for all experience levels. Since 1961, it’s safe to say we’ve had a few upgrades — so head on out to Sunburst and see what sets us apart.
